entries.femaleVariant: The force has ordered twenty of the Centaur units to be used in preventative patrols and MaxTac forces.
A ceremonial signing of the partnership took place at city hall. Police Commissioner Coleridge and Militech-Government Relations Executive Anthony Gilchrist were in attendance.
Officers in the NCPD put their lives on the line for us every day. They defend all Night Citizens against gang violence, nomad outlaws and cyberpsycho attacks.
Thanks to Militech's Centaur-class exosuits, they can keep themselves safe, and all the rest of us even safer.
Once again, Militech has proven its vital role in the reconstruction of America. After the break â€“ what quality is most important when hiring a personal bodyguard for your child?
The NCPD has expanded its arsenal to include Militech's Centaur-class exosuits.
